name: Last Gamble (Skill Card)
text:
Joey / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
At the start of the 5th turn, activate this Skill (count both players' turns).
During your Main Phase, you can reduce your LP to 100 and discard 2 cards from your hand. Roll a six-sided die and draw cards equal to the result.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
